attributes.additional_details: Having access to GP appointments has been problematic long before COVID19 however since the pandemic patients are on  hold over an hour to GP surgeries, most having to wait lengthy times for an appointment if they even get one at all
attributes.background: Review capacity within GP surgeries to facilitate patients being treated promptly and without delay.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615422
